column3: Total number of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation carried over from the previous year including persons under arrest during the year
column4: Total number of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation at the end of the year
column5: Persons in whose cases chargesheets were laid during the year
column6: Percentage of persons in custody or on bail during the stage of investigation pending at the end of the year to total persons in custody during the stage of investigation
column7: Percentage of persons in whose cases chargesheets were laid to total persons under custody or on bail during the stage of investigation

column2: Culpable Homicide Not Amounting to Murder
